data.name: Product Leadership Festival: Project to Product Management to CPO to CEO - Mapping My Product Leadership Journey
data.summary:
Product Leaders and Product Professionals sharing actionable perspectives on
careers, products, and current challenges.
data.speakers:
Saran Chatterjee, CEO, Housejoy.in
Sharad Sharma, CPO, Mettl
Rajiv Thondanoor, CPO, Cleartrip.com
Anurag Jain, CPO & SVP, Domino's |
Gaurav Raheja, CPO, Arvind Limited
